text: Sim (, 54°59'N 57°41'E) is town in Chelyabinsk Oblast, Russia. Its population is near 15,900 (2005). Sim is located on Sim River's bank. Town was founded in 1759 and named Simsky Zavod until 1942. Igor Kurchatov is from Sim. Category:18th-century establishments in Russia Category:1759 establishments Category:Cities and towns in Chelyabinsk Oblast
title: Sim, Chelyabinsk Oblast
